main event: On October 9, 1951, an unidentified aerial object was sighted over Hulman Municipal Airport and Terre Haute, Indiana.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses observed a silver, metallic object around the size of a half-dollar,The object moved in a southeasterly direction and then a northeasterly direction,One witness described the object as resembling a disc and traveling at a high speed of approximately 2,500 miles per hour,There were several reports of the object from different observers at various times,No vapor trails or sound were associated with the sightings.
witness description: Chief Aircraft Communicator and other military personnel
